results.name: A Rauzy fractal sequence: trajectory of 1 under morphism 1 -> 1,2,1,3; 2 -> 3; 3 -> 1.
link: P. Arnoux and E. Harriss, What is a Rauzy Fractal?, Notices Amer. Math. Soc., 61 (No. 7, 2014), 768-770, also p. 704 and front cover.
Marcy Barge and Jaroslaw Kwapisz, Geometric theory of unimodular Pisot substitutions, Amer. J. Math. 128 (2006), no. 5, 1219--1282. MR2262174 (2007m:37039). See Fig. 18.1.
Index entries for sequences that are fixed points of mappings
